TextEng: Well, we finally got here. I want to thank you for all your help. I know that I was a bit hard on you at times... we probably wouldn't have made it this time without you.
Text: 드디어 도착했네. 도와줘서 고마워. 가끔 좀 심하게 대한 건 알아... 이번엔 당신 없이는 못 왔을 거야.

TextEng: You will probably be wanting to hire a guide to take you to the dig site where your Garrick fellow went. It's a little ways into the desert, I understand, and only the locals really know the way.
Text: 그 개릭인가 하는 사람이 간 발굴 현장까지 안내해줄 사람을 고용하고 싶겠지. 사막 안쪽으로 좀 들어가야 하는데, 현지인들만 길을 제대로 알아.

TextEng: I am sure one of the Ao worshippers will be willing to take you. They're a fairly agreeable bunch, if a bit daft. Is there anything else you want before you leave?
Text: 에이오 숭배자들 중 한 명이 기꺼이 데려다줄 거야. 좀 멍청하긴 해도 꽤 붙임성 좋은 사람들이거든. 떠나기 전에 다른 필요한 거 있어?

TextEng: Well, take care of yourself out there, <FirstName>. Don't go doing anything crazy, like joining the Ao folk or anything. Good bye.
Text: 그럼, 밖에서 조심해, <FirstName>. 에이오 사람들한테 합류한다거나 미친 짓 하지 마. 잘 가.

TextEng: Yes, well... you were a big help to us back in Hilltop with Daschnaya. Not to mention getting us here in one piece.
Text: 그래, 뭐... 힐탑에서 다슈냐 일 때 많이 도와줬지. 여기까지 무사히 데려다준 것도 말할 것 없고.

TextEng: There's few enough folk around who give us the time of day. So I truly thank you, <FirstName>. Maybe we'll travel together again.
Text: 우리한테 관심 가져주는 사람이 별로 없거든. 그래서 정말 고마워, <FirstName>. 언젠가 또 같이 여행하게 될지도.

TextEng: I know that we were just doing the dwarf a favor, and I wasn't planning on paying you anything... but there's few enough folk who treat us as decently as you have.
Text: 드워프한테 호의로 한 거고, 보수를 줄 생각은 없었는데... 당신처럼 우릴 제대로 대해주는 사람이 별로 없거든.

TextEng: So here... a little token from us to you. Use it in good health. Perhaps we'll travel together again, some day.
Text: 그래서 여기... 우리가 주는 작은 선물이야. 건강하게 써. 언젠가 또 같이 여행하게 될지도.

TextEng: What would you like to know?
Text: 뭘 알고 싶어?

TextEng: Tall, ugly, human scholar. Actually, in his crowd that could be quite a feat. That mostly describes every one of the archaeologist folk I remember.
Text: 키 크고, 못생긴, 인간 학자. 사실 저 무리에선 그게 별 특징도 안 돼. 내가 기억하는 고고학자들 대부분이 그러니까.

TextEng: Oh, he is male too, that should cut it down by say... two. Sorry, but I'm sure if you ask, somebody will direct you to him.  Anything else?
Text: 아, 남자이기도 해, 그러면... 두 명 정도로 줄겠네. 미안, 근데 물어보면 누가 안내해줄 거야. 다른 거 있어?

TextEng: They aren't a bad bunch, though there are a few with some very strange ideas. One of the priests likes to whip himself and... well, I don't care for it much, but to each his own.
Text: 나쁜 사람들은 아닌데, 몇몇은 정말 이상한 생각을 가지고 있어. 사제 중 한 명은 자기 자신을 채찍질하는 걸 좋아하고... 뭐, 별로 안 좋아하지만, 각자 취향이니까.

TextEng: I don't like to knock another person's religion, but any religion where the god couldn't care less about his followers... what can I say?
Text: 남의 종교를 깎아내리긴 싫은데, 신이 추종자들한테 관심도 없는 종교라니... 할 말이 없네.

TextEng: Anyways, that's all I have to say about them. Anything else?
Text: 어쨌든, 그들에 대해 할 말은 그게 다야. 다른 거 있어?

TextEng: Well, of course you can. You get the premium discount too.
Text: 물론이지. 특별 할인도 해줄게.

TextEng: Paid? I was thinking of asking you for some gold to cover all the food you ate. We're not wealthy, after all, and we took you and the others along as a favor to your mentor.
Text: 보수라고? 네가 먹은 음식값 내라고 금화 좀 달라고 할까 했는데. 우린 부자가 아니고, 너랑 다른 사람들을 네 스승한테 호의로 데려온 거거든.

TextEng: At any rate, you're here and here's where we agreed to take you. I will still allow you to buy some supplies at a good price, if you are interested.
Text: 어쨌든, 여기 도착했고 여기가 데려다주기로 한 곳이야. 관심 있으면 좋은 가격에 물자를 사게 해줄게.

TextEng: Your eagerness to leave would have nothing to do with your little visit to Torias's hidden cache last night, would it?
Text: 빨리 떠나고 싶어하는 게 어젯밤 토리아스의 숨겨진 창고 방문이랑 관련 없겠지?

TextEng: I always know what is going on in my caravan; that's my job. I know all about Torias's little enterprise, and have known since the day he sold his first caltrops.
Text: 내 캐러밴에서 무슨 일이 일어나는지 항상 알아; 그게 내 일이야. 토리아스의 작은 사업에 대해 다 알고, 그가 첫 철퇴를 판 날부터 알았어.

TextEng: Ordering halflings around is not the same a sharing your wisdom. I ought to charge you for the use of my workers as your personal servants.
Text: 하플링들한테 명령하는 건 지혜를 나누는 게 아니야. 내 일꾼들을 개인 하인으로 쓴 대가를 받아야겠어.

TextEng: No, though it's tempting, considering the kind of cook you made. No offense.
Text: 아니, 유혹적이긴 한데, 네가 어떤 요리사였는지 생각하면. 기분 나쁘게 듣지 마.

TextEng: No, the desert is no place to be on foot with no source of shade for rest stops. How the Bedine tolerate it is beyond me.
Text: 아니, 사막은 그늘도 없이 걸어다닐 곳이 아니야. 베다인들이 어떻게 견디는지 모르겠어.

TextEng: Awful... yes. I have no idea what those meaty chunks were, and I really don't want to know.
Text: 끔찍했어... 그래. 저 고기 덩어리들이 뭐였는지 모르겠고, 정말 알고 싶지도 않아.

TextEng: There is a very good chance that without <FirstName> here, Xanos would have been smothered in his sleep for annoying everyone else.
Text: <FirstName>이 없었으면 자노스는 다른 사람들 다 짜증나게 해서 자다가 질식사당했을 가능성이 높아.

TextEng: Good thing <FirstName> controls your finances then. Now, if you will kindly stop interrupting...
Text: 그럼 <FirstName>이 네 재정을 관리하는 게 다행이네. 이제, 끼어들기 좀 그만하면...

TextEng: True enough. I don't think I'll be hiring on any more kobolds to do the cooking, however.
Text: 맞는 말이야. 하지만 이제 코볼트를 더 고용해서 요리시키진 않을 거야.

TextEng: Well, I spent half of last night awake and belching uncontrollably from dinner... and I'm really too frightened to ask why that is.
Text: 글쎄, 어젯밤 절반을 저녁 때문에 깨어서 주체 못하게 트림하면서 보냈는데... 왜 그런지 물어보기가 정말 무서워.

TextEng: No. Really. I don't *want* to know. Ever.
Text: 아니. 진짜. 알고 싶지 *않아*. 절대.

TextEng: Best of luck in your journeys, <FirstName>. Is there anything you needed?
Text: 여행에 행운을 빌어, <FirstName>. 필요한 거 있어?

TextEng: Believe me, cousin, you were more of a charmer when you were drunk.
Text: 믿어, 사촌, 취했을 때가 더 매력적이었어.

TextEng: I swear he's going to explode.
Text: 저 사람 터질 것 같아.
